name.ja: パパのピッツェリアはブロックされていないゲーム
name.ko: Papa의 피자 가이아는 차단되지 않은 게임을 해제했습니다

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,de,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_U: Play Papa's Pizzeria Game right now. Discover the Joy of palying this game - Your Ultimate Online Happy Experience! Try it now!
short.da: Spil Papas Pizzeria -spil lige nu. Oplev glæden ved at palyere dette spil - din ultimative online lykkelige oplevelse! Prøv det nu!
short.el: Παίξτε το παιχνίδι Pizzeria του Papa αυτή τη στιγμή. Ανακαλύψτε τη χαρά του Palying αυτού του παιχνιδιού - την απόλυτη σε απευθείας…
short.es: Juega el juego de pizzería de papá en este momento. Descubra la alegría de palidecer este juego, ¡tu mejor experiencia feliz en…
short.et: Mängige praegu Papa Pizzeria mängu. Avastage selle mängu rõõmustamise rõõm - teie ülim veebipõhine õnnelik kogemus! Proovige seda…
short.ja: パパのピッツェリアゲームを今プレイしてください。このゲームを味わう喜びを発見してください - あなたの究極のオンラインハッピーエクスペリエンス！やってみよう！
short.ko: 지금 Papa의 피자 리아 게임을 플레이하십시오. 이 게임을 Pallying의 기쁨을 발견하십시오 - 당신의 최고의 온라인 행복한 경험! 지금 시도해보십시오!
short.nl: Speel nu Papa's Pizzeria -game. Ontdek de vreugde van het palyen van dit spel - je ultieme online gelukkige ervaring! Probeer het…
short.tr: Şu anda Papa’nın Pizzeria Oyunu oynayın. Bu oyunu palying sevincini keşfedin - nihai çevrimiçi mutlu deneyiminiz! Şimdi dene!
short.vi: Chơi trò chơi pizzeria Papa ngay bây giờ. Khám phá niềm vui của trò chơi này - trải nghiệm hạnh phúc trực tuyến cuối cùng của bạn!…
short.zh_CN: 现在正在玩爸爸的比萨店游戏。发现这款游戏的启动的乐趣 - 您的最终在线快乐体验！现在就试试！
short.zh_TW: 現在正在玩爸爸的比薩店遊戲。發現這款遊戲的啟動的樂趣 - 您的最終在線快樂體驗！現在就試試！

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Play Papa's Pizzeria Game right now. Discover the Joy of palying this game - Your Ultimate Online Happy Experience! Try it now!

Papa's Pizzeria offers a variety of features that make the gameplay enjoyable:

*Pizza Customization: Create personalized pizzas by choosing from different crusts, sauces, cheeses, and toppings.
*Order Management: Pay attention to customer preferences and craft the pizzas according to their specifications to earn higher tips.
*Unlockable Upgrades: Improve your pizzeria with new ovens, ingredients, sauces, and decorations as you progress.
*Mini-Games: Take a break from pizza-making and engage in fun mini-games to earn extra rewards.
*Seasonal Specials: Introduce seasonal ingredients and limited-time pizza specials to attract more customers.
